module.name: Bulk Extensions
module.description: Bulk Extensions uses CSV files to import and export extensions.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.7* #7363 *2.11.0.6* Generate license file *2.11.0.1* #7099 *2.11.0.0* #6149 *2.10.0.4* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.4 *2.10.0.3* cleanup *2.10.0.2* #5649, #5667 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5091 template.csv was missing three fields *2.9.0.4* standardize spelling *2.9.0.3* Updated localizations *2.9.0.2* Bulk Extensions is only supported when FreePBX run in extensions mode *2.9.0.1* Update to handle extension destinations, code cleanup *2.9.0.0* Update for 2.9 changes *2.7.0.0* #4567 Add fax setting *2.6.0.7* #4495 *2.5.0.6* #4150 *2.5.0.5* Add permit/deny fields provided by 4Colo. Fixed a small bug in table.csv. Fixed spelling error in template.csv. Added localization for table.csv. See CHANGES for how-to. *2.5.0.4* No changes, re-publishing to get md5sum and location info updated *2.5.0.3* Fixed bug - every notification email after the first one had increasing amounts of unwanted white space at the beginning of the message *2.5.0.2* New feature - Enforce extension range restrictions for admin users - thanks dinhtrung New feature - Email notification for new accounts *2.5.0.1* changed includes to include_once *2.5.0* Version for FreePBX 2.5 *0.2.1* Beta support for FreePBX 2.5 (unreleased) *0.2.0* New feature - Export Extensions Documented all supported Extension fields Minor code clean ups *0.1.1* Fixed bad path and error in tar file *0.1* First release
